name: test_e2e_with_logs[555_CRLF_ENC_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_ENC_006` |
| **Name** | Null Byte with CRLF Injection |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | encoded_crlf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `Null byte followed by CRLF injection`
- **Encoded**: `%00%0d%0aX-Null-Injected%3Atrue`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~17000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:12:05.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected test_id=CRLF_ENC_006-1772266325654-i7fo8f pattern_id=CRLF_ENC_006 uri=/?q=%00%0d%0aX-Null-Injected%3Atrue client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected test_id=CRLF_ENC_006-1772266325654-i7fo8f pattern_id=CRLF_ENC_006 uri=/?q=%00%0d%0aX-Null-Injected%3Atrue client=127.0.0.1
